#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked
#define _ (ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0); cin.tie(0);)

typedef long long ll;
using namespace std;

inline int s()
{
    register char c;
    int a = 0;
    while(c<'0'||c>'9') c=gc();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9') a = (a<<3)+(a<<1)+(c-'0'), c=gc();
    return a;
}

inline void p(int a)
{
    if(a<0)
        pc('-');
    if(a==0)
    {
        pc('0'); pc('\n');
        return;
    }
    char arr[21];
    int i=0;
    while(a)
    {
        arr[i] = ((a%10)+'0');
        a/=10;
        i++;
    }
    arr[i] = '\0';
    for(int i= strlen(arr)-1; i>=0; i--)
        pc(arr[i]);
    pc('\n');
}


int main() {
    int t=s();
    while(t--)
    {
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        int ctr=0;
        if(s.length() == 1)
        {
            p(2);
            continue;
        }
        if(s[0]!=s[1])
            ctr++;
        if(s[s.length()-2]!=s[s.length()-1])
            ctr++;
        for(int i=1; i<s.length()-1; i++)
        {
            if((s[i]!=s[i-1])&&(s[i]!=s[i+1]))
                ctr++;
        }
        unsigned long long ans = pow(2,ctr);
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
	return 0;
}
